function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

changes in the effective reproduction number r eff due to varying npi effectiveness","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the during curfew npis across regions","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wide range of basic reproductive number estimates across different regions","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Using a modeling framework to estimate region-specific parameters for epidemic seeding dates, basic reproduction number, and npi effectiveness may lead to inaccuracies in the estimation of these parameters and their impact on epidemic trajectories.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inference on model parameters for spatial locations based on covid-19 transmission dynamics may lead to biased or oversimplified conclusions about disease systems may lead to the proliferation of legionella bacteria.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in comfort level may lead to higher occupancy and greater spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Introduction of demand-based control and automated functions may lead to an increase in aerosol transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved information to occupants may lead disease transmission.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"}]}
